summary: Most requested Rose Day UI elements are implemented: single-page RoseDay route, exact hero heading, rose-garden background with glow overlay, falling roses, sparkles, floating hearts, highlighted dedication box, closing line, cursive typography + updated HTML title, and a user-controlled music toggle. One key interaction detail is missing: per-rose message cycling on repeated clicks. There is also an apparent violation of the 'immutable paths must not be edited' constraint (useInternetIdentity.ts was modified).

missing_requirements.requirement: Repeated clicks on a rose should cycle through available messages for that rose (or deterministically show another message per-rose), not just toggle the same message.
missing_requirements.reason: InteractiveRosesSection assigns a single fixed message per rose at initialization and the click handler only toggles `revealed` true/false; there is no logic to change/cycle the message on repeated clicks.

hallucinated_features.description: Background music is loaded from an external third-party URL (Pixabay CDN).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for optional background music with a toggle; it did not request or specify using a third-party hosted audio asset.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a promotional/footer attribution link to caffeine.ai.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not ask for an attribution footer or external link.

hallucinated_features.description: Edited a frontend file under an explicitly immutable path (useInternetIdentity.ts).
hallucinated_features.reason: Constraints state frontend files under immutable paths must not be edited; the diff shows it as modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced external Google Fonts (Dancing Script, Great Vibes) via fonts.googleapis.com.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-6 requests cursive typography but does not explicitly request adding external font dependencies.
